Workato SDK CLI

Command-line interface for developing Workato connectors

Overview

The Workato SDK CLI provides a command-line interface for developing, testing, and deploying custom connectors.

Installation

To install the SDK CLI, run:

gem install workato-sdk

Available Commands

new

Create a new connector project:

workato sdk new my-connector

test

Run tests for your connector:

workato sdk test

validate

Validate your connector configuration:

workato sdk validate

Configuration

The CLI reads configuration from connector.rb and settings.yaml.enc files.

Environment Variables

  • WORKATO_API_TOKEN: Your Workato API token
  • WORKATO_ENDPOINT: Workato API endpoint (optional)
